sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
common
, tisto najdemo v velikem številu ali se pogosto dogaja.

seg.quote: Durand is a common name there.
It was quite common for dogs to be poisoned this way.
The most commonly used argument is that clients do not like long delays.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
common to several people
, tisto vsi imajo, delajo ali uporabljajo.

seg.quote: It suppressed the desire for freedom common to all people.

sense.def:
Common
uporabljamo tudi v pomenu, da je nekaj navadno in ne nekaj posebnega.

seg.quote: Sodium chloride is better known as common salt.

sense.def:
Kdor je
common
, se vede tako, da kaže pomanjkanje okusa, izobrazbe in olike.

A common
je javno travnato območje blizu vasi.

Kadar je nekaj storjeno
for the common good
, je storjeno v korist vseh ljudi.

Common ground
je tisto, o čemer se strinja več ljudi.

seg.quote: There is no common ground upon which dialogue can be based.

sense.def:
Kadar imata dve ali več stvari nekaj
in common
, imajo enake lastnosti.

seg.quote: In common with many other companies, we advertise in the local press.
